Yafei Ou
Yafei Ou

Bio

I am now a Researcher Institute of Innovative Research, Tokyo Institute of Technology. I got my Ph.D. degree from Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, Hokkaido University in March 2023, supervised by Prof. Masayuki Ikebe.

My main interests are in Medical Image Analysis, Multi-modal, Explainable AI, and Computer Vision.

We are seeking collaborations in rheumatoid arthritis [link].
